name: Untitled Bullet Hell Game
description:
Hi!

This game was made for a school project and it's also my first (complete) game ever. This game is a typical bullet hell with 3 levels of difficulty. There is also a 4th level but I didn't have time to finish it. Like any other bullet hell, you have to shoot down the enemy while dodging a bunch of bullets .  While playing, you will sometimes notice that some bullets touched you but it didn't damage you and that's because I made the player's hitbox really small or the game would be wayyy to hard. If you can't figure how the controls work, I added a special menu that tells you how the work.

Enjoy :)
